Title: Requires the commissioner of education to study the educational model at The Eagle Academy and develop an educational program to be utilized by certain schools
Summary: Requires the commissioner of education to study the educational model at The Eagle Academy and develop an educational program to be utilized by certain schools.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring a study of the educational model at The Eagle Academy and developing an education program to be utilized by certain schools
